items.title: Here Are 5 Companies I'd Aggressively Add To Amid Rising Market Volatility
items.description: Despite recent market volatility, now is the time to be aggressive in investing. Check out five stocks I'll be adding to if the market continues to crash.

items.title: Fidelity Select Consumer Discretionary Portfolio Q4 2024 Review
items.description: For the quarter, the fund gained 10.33%, slightly underperforming the MSCI U.S. IMI Consumer Discretionary 25/50 Index. Read more here.

items.title: Fidelity Select Communication Services Portfolio Q4 2024 Review
items.description: The communication services sector gained 6.81% for the fourth quarter, according to the MSCI U.S. IMI Communication Services 25/50 (Media Linked) Index. Read more here.

items.title: Extremes Go Both Ways; It's Called Mean Reversion
items.description: The downdraft to date is Apple -15%, Microsoft -19%, Nvidia -27%, Amazon -20%, Meta -19.6%, and Alphabet -20%. Click to read.

items.title: Amazon: Growth Scare Presents An Opportunity
items.description: Discover why Amazon's growth in online retail, AWS, and advertising, coupled with attractive valuations, offers a compelling investment opportunity today.
